line: How's the view up there, Ferb?
This is the life. The sand, the sea, the sun.
(Sobbing)
The crying? Hey, what's wrong, Buford? Why are you crying?
First, let's get one thing straight: I'm not crying. I'm just sweating through my eyes. And second...I lost Biff! (Sobbing)
You mean your goldfish?
Yes! (Sobbing) He changed my life, you know. I used to be a wimp, just like you. But then, one day, at the carnival, I was somehow drawn to this game.
(Hammers, Ding)
And that's how I won my goldfish. I named it Biff, after my mother. It was the happiest day of my life. But then I met the local bully.
Hello, nerd! Well, well, what do we have here? Looks like you brought me lunch! (Puts Biff over his mouth) (Laughs)
I knew I had to defend my friend, so I did what I had to do.

After that, I became the bully. And I wasn't afraid of anything or anybody. Except, you know, maybe a giant squid, cause-- Come on, those are freaky, right? All suction cuppy and beaky. (Waves splashing) But then, today...Biff and I decided to go for a swim. After a while, I couldn't hear him anymore. I got worried.
No! NO!!
(Sobbing hysterically)
Wow. This was more annoying than when he was bullying us. We gotta do something to get the old Buford back. Maybe we should help him find his fish.
Really? You guys would do that? How about a hug?
Maybe later.
Let Buford hug you.
Hey, where's Perry?
Come here!
Morning, Agent P. We've intercepted some very surprising footage from a local TV station. (Plays video)
Breaking news: A kitten in peril! Up a tree! (Cat falls) Oh no!
Wow, a good Samaritan saved her!
(Stops video) You see that? Dr. Doofenshmirtz saving a kitten. Looks like he's defecting to the good side! Make contact and present him with our standard welcome package. Monogram out.
(Puts on glasses shaped like the sun) How about these? Do you think Jeremy would like them? (Gasps) Ooh, these are even better!
Hey, Candace, look, is that a submarine? (Helicopter whirring) And aren't those your brothers?
I can't believe how fast we put this together.
Yes. Usually takes us at least a montage.
(Wearing fish glasses) They're not getting away with this. I know what I'm getting. I'm gonna get this disposable camera, and then I'll finally have proof, and I can bust them!
Hey, you gotta pay for that!
Right after I pay for this.

Hello? Oh, Perry the Platypus. What do you want? Oh, a gift for me? (Unhooks chain lock) Oh, how sweet of you! Oh, what's this note attached? "Congratulations, Dr. Heinz Doofenshmirtz, on defecting to the good side"? Oh no, not you, too! The TV's been repeating that news footage all day! First, I'm not going to the good side. Second, I'm going to keep this basket. There's a lot of goodies here. Third, let me tell you what really happened.
Uh, hello? (Presses button on remote)
I wasn't done talking yet. That was sort of rude.
All right, Isabella. Now it's your turn, Baljeet.
(Sobbing)
Why is Buford crying?
I'm not cryin'! I'm sweatin' through my eyes! (Sobbing)
All right, Buford. You're next.
That doesn't look very safe. (Goes in)
You're doing fine.
Hey, I'm stuck! I'm stuck! (Sobbing)
Hey, Buford, are you...sweating out of your eyes?
(pause) No, I'm just cryiiiiiing! (Sobbing) (Ferb lands on him) Thanks. I needed that.
Ready when you are, Captain.
We're ready to go. How's Buford?
Buford is doing great! I just hope we'll be able to find my friend Biff. (Points at bowl, Sobbing)
Don't worry. Ferb can communicate with dolphins. (Dolphins chirping) They'll help us find your goldfish.
(Gasps) Biff! He looks so sweet! (Sobbing, Puts picture in fish bowl) How about a hug? (Ferb puts hand up) Come on!
All right, everyone, the dolphins are leading the way.
(Snapshot)
Let's follow those aquatic mammals.
Aye aye, Captain!
(Babbling)
Uh, Buford, you just stay put.
(Whimpering)
(Sobbing)
We've got to find that fish. Soon.
I've got something on the radar!
(Snapshot)
All right, it's time for a swim!
You found my friend? How about a hug? (Sobs) Hug!
(Snapshot)
Biff! Biff! Buford love Biff!

So, Perry the Platypus, allow me to introduce the Media Erase-inator! Patent pending, Doofenshmirtz Evil Inc. It will erase all video signals, print ads, basically it will erase any image in the entire Tri-State Area! And I will be able to attend my reunion without any embarrassment.
(Whips head, fedora flies and hits remote, breaking the remote and releasing trap)
Huh? But I-- (Perry kicks Doofenshmirtz) Oof!
Hey, guys, look! He missed me.
It sure looks like it.
(Puts fishbowl through Biff) There you go, little buddy. You're all safe now. Let's get out of here.
I got my Biff back. Thank you, guys! How about a hug?
Maybe later.
I'm so happy, I could cry! (Sobbing)
I wish we'd get our Buford back. Uh, Buford?
(Screams)
(On the octopus tentacle) A little help here?
(Goes into submarine)
Oh, good, you found Biff! (Screams)
Hey, where are Phineas and Ferb? (Screams)
(Gasps) It's all suction cuppy and beaky! (Whimpering)
NO! BIFF!!
Hmm. A giant squid. What are the odds?
My money is on the squid.
Cut me off a slice of that action,
Hey, squid! (Jumps off) Drop the goldfish! You and me are gonna dance!
So, I guess that's that.
I do not know how he does it.
Always go for the long shots, kid.
Good day for Buford, huh? He got Biff back, and I don't think he's afraid of squids anymore.
Alright, there's nothing to see here. Everybody back inside.
That was amazing! I can't believe I got all of this on film.
(Goes into submarine)
Hey, Buford, you were really brave out there.
What's that supposed to mean? (Grabs Phineas) You think I was a wimp before?
N-no, not really. But you were a lot more sensitive.
What did you say? (Drops Phineas, Does the Wet Willie on Baljeet)
Yeah, Buford is back!
(Come out of submarine) What? I've got to save the camera! Save the camera, save the camera, save the camera!
Yay! We are back! We made it! (Falls back)
I told ya I was comin' out first! Biff and I have some catchin' up to do.
Save the camera, save-save the cam-- Save the camera. Save the camera, save the camera, save the camera. (Notices bike) Save the camera, save the camera, save the camera!
Hey, you gotta pay for that.
Right after I pay for this.
It's going crazy! It's shooting all over willy-nilly, but really half-nilly!
I can't wait to show this to Mom! Hee hee hee.
Finally, I got those boys! (Water splashing, Film springs out of camera)
Wait! Where are you going? (Media Erase-inator blows up) Curse you, Perry the Platypus! (Kitten falls into his hands) Oh, come on!
Candace, honey, you're all wet. Are you okay?
Phineas and Ferb...submarine...dolphins...giant octopus...
I don't have time for these games. Dry yourself off before you come in.
Hey, sis. Have a good swim?
(Growls)
